name: arcgis-section-508-table-viewer
description: View data from ArcGIS server service in Section 508 compatible table

scripts.build:ts: tsc -p src/browser/tsconfig.json && tsc -p src/worker/tsconfig.json && tsc -p src/worker_modules/tsconfig.json
scripts.build: npm run build:less && npm run build:ts

author: WSDOT
